group_1.narration: "Everything has gone according to plan... @That sweet romance you've been wishing for, @I'll tear it to shreds!"
"He's fallen for the one you hate most @and will never come back to you again."

group_1.textCenter: (Next time, a fierce battle erupts over Mitsuru's @heart...)
Dammit! How could you do this to me?!

group_1.textRight: What are you yelling about? @People can hear you outside...

group_1.textLeft: This damn manga ended right in the middle @of things!
I can't stand it when somethin' doesn't have a clear ending!
[chara:102400:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, when the fuck did you get here?!

group_1.textRight: Look, I just bought a new video game. Wanna play it with me?

group_1.textLeft: Only if it has a clear winner.
[chara:102400:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Perfect.
With this stalemate between us and Torayamachi @goin' on, I'll take anything that puts me in a better mood.

group_1.textRight: Just so you know, I've played this a lot at the arcade.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, come on...
How's losing to you supposed to make Juri the Great @feel any better?

group_1.textRight: Then why don't we go wreck Torayamachi? @That'll put you in a great mood for sure.

group_1.textLeft: We would if we could.
That's what's got me so pissed off...

group_1.textRight: Then what if we join forces with them instead?
People are saying that Witches are reappearing in Futatsugi.

group_1.textLeft: Do ya really expect me to believe somethin' @like that?
I'd rather spend my time cuttin' down the number @of Magical Girls that need Seeds
than makin' friends and starving along with them.
Speaking of, y'know that girl who stole some @of our Grief Seeds?

group_1.textRight: That seventh grader? @We only suspect her of it.

group_1.textLeft: I don't care if she was suspected or intercepted.
Someone like that needs to "go", don't ya think?
It's one less mouth to feed, plus we'll even get a @Grief Seed back from her if we turn her into a Witch.

group_1.textRight: You're not wrong, @but you don't mean that, do you?

group_1.textLeft: 'Course not. I'm just kiddin'.
Though I'm dead serious about crushin' @Torayamachi.
But since we're evenly matched, @I can't do jack about it...

It. [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]Really. [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]Pisses. [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]Me. [chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:0.3][chara:102400:effect_shake][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]Off...!
You think me gettin' angry is funny...?

group_1.textRight: But maybe I can cheer you up a bit @after all.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: We're not so evenly matched anymore.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah...?@[chara:102400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102400:cheek_0][chara:102400:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_100][chara:102400:lipSynch_1]What makes ya think that?
Their Army of Shadows... @They lost it...?
Heehee. @You shoulda told me sooner, then!

group_1.textCenter: Hello~ @I see this place is as dank as ever~
